architectural_notes: Role assignment is currently restricted to admins; non-admin attempts trigger 'only admins can assign user role' error and may block onboarding/create-share flow.
Create & Share depends on authentication/profile completion/phone verification; backend may be blocking requests when prerequisites aren’t met.
known_issues: Create & Share button appears unresponsive or blocked for some users depending on auth/profile/verification state.
Users encounter error 'only admins can assign user role' when attempting actions that should be allowed for regular users (role/onboarding permissions misconfigured).

existing_features.title: Improve frontend error handling for signup/registration so that if any backend authorization/role assignment error occurs, the UI shows a clear English error message and provides a next step (e.g., retry registration, verify phone, or contact admin) instead of appearing to do nothing.

Ensure the Create & Share (Save & Share Bio Page) flow fails loudly with actionable messages when prerequisites are missing (not logged in, not registered, phone not verified) rather than silently failing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Create & Share flow so it doesn’t silently fail; ensure proper handling when user is not logged in/registered/verified and allow create/share to proceed when requirements are met.
Add clear UI error messaging for Create & Share (and related actions) instead of appearing to do nothing; surface backend/auth/validation errors to the user.

Resolve role-assignment/admin permission issue: users hitting 'only admins can assign user role' should not be blocked from normal onboarding/usage; adjust permission checks/role assignment flow accordingly.
Fix the backend registration flow so newly registered users are not blocked by the error "Only admins can assign user role" when assigning the default user role after signup.

projectName: Fix 'Only admins can assign user role' blocking registration and Create & Share flow
